_comment: ゲームチェンジシナジー。特定条件で「別ゲー」になる組み合わせ。v0.4: 8種。

synergies.name: Chain Reaction
synergies.description: Chain + Fork: Each chain also forks. Projectiles multiply exponentially.

effect._game_change: Single projectile becomes a screen-filling cascade. 1 shot can clear a wave.

synergies.discovery_hint: What if a bouncing projectile split every time it bounced?

synergies.name: Death Spiral
synergies.description: Orbit + Trigger-on-kill: Kills spawn orbiting projectiles. Self-sustaining vortex.

effect._game_change: Tower creates a growing death spiral. More kills = more orbiting projectiles = more kills.

synergies.name: Elemental Convergence
synergies.description: Tower has skills with 3+ different elemental tags: All damage +100%, resistance shred.

effect._game_change: Enemies melt. The investment of diverse elements pays off massively.

synergies.name: Frozen Storm
synergies.description: Ice Shard skill + Chain support: Chain bounces propagate freeze. Each bounced enemy is frozen for 1s.

effect._game_change: One ice shard freezes an entire group. Chain of ice locks down the screen.

synergies.discovery_hint: A cold chain reaction... everything stops.

synergies.name: Plague Bearer
synergies.description: Poison Nova skill + Spread support: Dead poisoned enemies leave toxic clouds (3s, 2 dmg/s, 40px).

effect._game_change: Battlefield becomes a minefield of poison. Area denial + passive damage.

synergies.discovery_hint: When poison spreads beyond the host...

synergies.name: Thunder God
synergies.description: Spark skill + Concentrate support: All projectiles merge into one AoE lightning bolt (+200% damage, 80px radius).

effect._game_change: Instead of many weak sparks, one devastating lightning strike. Massive single-target burst.

synergies.discovery_hint: Focus all the lightning into a single point...

synergies.name: Soul Harvest
synergies.description: Holy Beam skill + Trigger support: Each kill heals tower for 10% max HP and emits a radial pulse.

effect._game_change: Holy Beam becomes a sustain machine. Killing heals and damages nearby.

synergies.discovery_hint: The beam judges and the tower is restored...

synergies.name: Chaos Engine
synergies.description: 3+ different prefix mods equipped across all modules: All prefix effects +50% stronger.

effect._game_change: Mod diversity pays off. Freeze harder, burn longer, crit bigger. Jack of all trades becomes master of all.

synergies.name: Summoner's Pact
synergies.description: Summon Wisp skill + Trigger support: Expired wisps summon replacements. Self-sustaining familiar army (max 8).

effect._game_change: Wisps multiply. One becomes many. The army sustains itself forever.

synergies.discovery_hint: What if a wisp's death was just a beginning?
